channel.title: Repost on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in Repost on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: Freedom
item.description:
Beautifully phrased, Colin. Freedom is heavily understated and appreciated in this day and age!

Repost of 15/06/2017 9:14am by Colin Walker:

Irrespective of how I post I am always reminded of how fortunate I am to be able to do so, and to do so publicly on the web. That’s something we should never forget or take for granted.

item.title: Google’s Proprietary Fork of HTML Is Taking Over the Open Web
item.description:
Repost of Google’s Proprietary Fork of HTML Is Taking Over the Open Web by Jack :

Consider this: Google owns the most popular search engine and the biggest video hosting platform in most countries, operates one of the most-used email services on Earth,1 has the greatest market share of any mobile operating system, makes the most popular web browser in many countries, serves the majority of the targeted advertising on the web, provides the most popular analytics software for websites, and is attempting to become a major internet service provider.

Repost of Google’s Proprietary Fork of HTML Is Taking Over the Open Web by Jack:

Consider this: Google owns the most popular search engine and the biggest video hosting platform in most countries, operates one of the most-used email services on Earth,1 has the greatest market share of any mobile operating system, makes the most popular web browser in many countries, serves the majority of the targeted advertising on the web, provides the most popular analytics software for websites, and is attempting to become a major internet service provider.
